title: Lag "hiccups"?
body: I've been getting a lot of these recently. Where the game pauses for a moment and skips some frames. Anyone else?

replies.body: This has been happening a lot more since patch 5.5. I had to use a custom skin which has less resolution to regain some fps but it's still happening fairly frequently.

getting these as well, and my computer specs should easily be able to run league at 144 fps without any hicups, yet sometimes it just crashes down to 12 fps for less then a second then spikes back up.

East coast here. I have been getting this as well, OP. Has been progressively worse, though I am not certain if it is an ISP issue or a Riot issue. However, nothing else really seems to be having much of an issue, so I am not certain at this time. 

May help if we state if we are East or West coast in case, you know, someone important notices this thread.
Try to re-install your graphics card drivers and check if the lag goes away. It could also be a sign that your pc is getting a bit too hot.
I've been getting the same problems as well.  "Attempting to Reconnect" multiple games and every 20 seconds or so, my game just "stalls" for a frame or two.
